title: No Kings Movement: June 14, 2025 Mass Protests and Constitutional Resistance
description: Document the massive 'No Kings' protests of June 14, 2025, involving over 5 million people across 2,100+ locations. Analyze as constitutional resistance movement targeting 3.5% population participation threshold.
research_areas: What were the specific dates of major 'No Kings' protest organization meetings?
Which cities had the largest protest participation on June 14, 2025?
What organizational networks coordinated the nationwide protests?
How did law enforcement respond to the protest movements?
source_requirements: Protest permits, organizational communications, arrest records, social media coordination, participation estimates
pdf_source: Constitutional Crisis Assessment_ The Convergence of Foreign Emoluments, Federal Overreach, and Popular Resistance.pdf
